publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1897.1 Tommy Sheridan: First ScotRail Anti-Violence Campaign—As an amendment to motion (S2M-1897) in the name of Ms Sandra White, insert at end "further notes that the RMT union has a policy of zero tolerance of violence against railway staff and of taking the prosecution of perpetrators to a successful conclusion, which is backed up by FirstGroup plc, and congratulates the RMT, the largest trade union in the railway industry, for persistently raising this matter with ScotRail over the last few years and for making sure that this problem will be tackled."
